author: danielknopik
content:
Hey everyone, as I mentioned on Monday, we are currently preparing the simulation config tool I developed (`ethshadow`) to be ready to be used by everyone. It is now available in the EF GitHub org, along with some docs: https://github.com/ethereum/ethshadow
If you want, try it out and let me know if you run into any issues, so that we can improve the documentation! :)

author: agnxsh
content: wow interesting! is it similar to https://github.com/NethermindEth/sedge ? or are there caveats?
